directions: Combine Aperol, vermouth, lemon juice, and bitters in a cocktail shaker. Fill shaker with ice and shake until outside of shaker is frosty, about 30 seconds. Strain into an ice-filled Old-Fashioned glass. Top with lemon soda and garnish with orange wheel.
ingredients: Bitter lemon soda (such as San Pellegrino Limonata or Fever-Tree Bitter Lemon)
title: Wild Heart Cocktail
